setting_descr: Here you can change global settings
lang_changed: Ok, your language changed to english
choose_lang: Please choose your language from below
hello:
Hello! I'm monitoring bot for EMCD system

Button 'Account' for work with accounts
Button 'FAQ' if you have a question
cabinet_msg: You have {account_count} registered accounts. Here you can manage them
add_account: Try to register new account with button 'Add' Here will be instruction which describe how to obtain api-key
add_account_descr: Please send me token from your account
account_added:
Ok, i've added your account. They will be named {account_name}
You can change list of coins in 'Settings' button
account_id_invalid: Your api key is invalid. Please check this key or message to support
account_id_already_registered:
You already registered this account, they named as {account_name}. Please check this key for validity or message support.
Account management in 'Account' button
account_cabinet:
Account statistic for {account_name}

Here you can check account stats
coin_list_descr: List of linked coins to account  {account_name}:

Choose coin to see finances
List of available coins you can change in 'Settings'

faq_msg_descr: Here you have a list of typically questions
curr_list: Here you can choose in which currency u need to convert coin
curr_update_unable: Sorry, convertation can't be disabled. If yon wanna change currency then please select any other currency
currency_not_found: Currency {currency_code} for you coin was not found. Fallback to {fallback_currency_code}
worker_blacklist_choose_coin: Выберите по какой монете вы хотите посмотреть чёрный список\nИзменить список монет можно в меню аккаунта

Blacklist menu
If you don't want see any notifications about worker status changes add them to black list

In list: {b_count}
